generics.archiveWarning: 🚨 2021년 3월 28일부터 miHoYo에서 6개월 이상 된 기원 정보를 삭제하고 있으므로 그에 해당하는 기원 정보는 가져올 수 없습니다. 만약 백업을 가지고 있다면 곧 사이트에서 불러올 수 있게 될 것입니다.

app.title: Genshin Wishes
app.description: Save and keep track of your wishes easily

dialog.title: 링크가 만료되었습니다.
dialog.message: 🚨 인증 링크가 만료되었습니다. 새로 발급받으세요. How?

urlInput.incorrectLink: 😱 링크가 올바르지 않아요. 다시 시도해 주세요.

1.title: Get your key
1.description: To get your wishes we need a temporary key from the game. Don't worry, we will never have access to your Genshin Impact account.

2.title: Hold on! We are getting your wishes 🐋 🙈
2.description: Repeat these steps next time to synchronize new wishes.

auth.hint: You are NOT signing into Genshin Impact
auth.subHint: We encourage you to choose a separate provider than your in-game account.
auth.logout.label: 로그아웃

cookie.title: 페이몬이 쿠키를 남겨두었어요! 😋
cookie.message: By using this site, you agree to the use of  cookies for traffic analysis only.

hero.title: Your Genshin Impact wish history in a single glance.
hero.subtitle: Backup your Genshin Impact wish history, keep track of your pity and get a shareable view of your pulls statistics!

counters.users: Trusted by over {{ users }} Genshin Impact players
counters.wishes: {{ wishes }} wishes backed up and counting

feature.title: All your wishes in one place.
feature.globalStats: Check global stats out of million wishes
feature.dashboard: Compute your pity on each banner
feature.archive: Archive wishes more than six month
feature.platforms: Available for PC, mobile and console players

security.title: We care about security.
security.noInstallation: No installation is required and we don't need your Genshin account.
security.temporaryKey: Your temporary key is not stored on our servers but on your device and is only valid for 24h.
security.authorization: The temporary key does not allow us to authenticate on your account.
security.ssl: We use SSL encryption for all connections between you and our servers.

welcome.title: Welcome on Genshin Wishes.
welcome.description: We help you track and backup your wish history from Genshin Impact. We can keep track of your pity counter too!

elements.pity: Compute your pity on each banner
elements.archive: Archive your wishes more than 6 months

footerBanner.joinUs: Join us to show off your lucky pulls!

footer.content: Sources of this project are available on GitHub. Genshin Wishes is made and maintained by Colin Auberger, Jimmy Vergerolle and Jessye Vergerolle.

notFound.title: This profile could not be found!
notFound.description: This profile is private or the URL is incorrect 😅

profile.footer: Automatically import your wishes from PC/Mobile/Console and get your own stats!

success$.message: Your permalink has been copied to your clipboard!

lang.title: Language
lang.subTitle: Change the site and items language

success$.message: The time format has been updated.

deleteAccount.title: Delete your account
deleteAccount.subTitle: Delete all your data on Genshin Wishes
deleteAccount.hint: Type {{ confirmation }} before clicking on the delete button.
deleteAccount.label: Type here

deleteAccountConfirm.title: Are you sure that you want to delete your account?

export.title: Export your wishes
export.subTitle: Export all your wishes stored on Genshin Wishes

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: Don’t worry they will also remain on your account.

globalStats.label: Global statistics

noResult.title: No stats were gathered for this event yet!
noResult.description: You can still check out other events stats or remove the event filter.

globalStats.gwUsersOnly: From Genshin Wishes users only (updated every {{ minutes }} minutes).
globalStats.allEventStats.label: All event stats

learnMore.title: About our statistics
learnMore.description: If you want to learn more about the wishes stats and pity, we wrote a reddit post about this!

globalStats.pityDistribution.title: {{ rank }}★ quantity by pull number
globalStats.wishesPerBanner.title: Wishes quantity per banner

stats.label: Statistics
stats.empty: Sorry, we could not find anything...
stats.rankDistribution.title: Wish ranks
stats.focusDistribution.title: {{ rankType }}★ exclusivity
stats.fourStarsDetails.title: 4★ types
stats.fiveStarsList.title: 5★ list
stats.fourStarsList.title: 4★ list
stats.bannerActivity.title: Wishes over time

wishes.label: Wishes

noWishes.title: No wish found for this banner
noWishes.message: You can still play with Amber 😅

noResult.title: Oh no! There is nothing like this!

wishes.itemNotFound: Item not found, we will update our database as soon as possible!

deletion.title: Delete old wishes
deletion.description:
Are you sure you want to delete your old wishes?

Any deletion is irreversible.

differentUidDialog.title: Different account
differentUidDialog.description:
🚨 The wishes you are about to add are not linked to the same Genshin account.

What do you want to do?

success$.message: {{ wishes }} new wishes found in {{ banner }} !

noData$.title: Sorry, no new wishes found
noData$.message: Wishes made less than an hour ago cannot be added yet.

newWishesDuringImport$.message: Sorry, your wish history changed during the import. Please try again.

alreadyImporting$.message: An import of your wishes is already occurring, please be patient!
